BLHar2252.First Lines: What can hyt avayleHo dryve forthe a snayle…
BLHar2252.Last Lines: …Thyngis þat ar amysWhen hys pleasure ys

BLLan762.Note:
‘The Profecy of Skelton’; same as lines 462-80 of Dyce
                    text.

Dyce,  Alexander,
                        ed.

         2 vols. London: T. Rodd, 1843: 1.329.
Dyce,  Alexander,  and  Izaak Walton, eds.  
             The Poetical Works of Skelton and Donne.
